user_stories.title: Parse and validate a config file
user_stories.description: Create a library that reads a JSON config file with fields: name (string, required), port (u16, default 8080), debug (bool, default false), tags (array of strings, optional). Validate all fields and return a typed Config struct. Return descriptive errors for invalid input.
acceptance_criteria: Valid JSON with all fields parses correctly
Missing required 'name' field returns an error
Invalid types (e.g., port as string) return descriptive errors
Unit tests cover valid, partial, and invalid inputs

technical_requirements: Use Rust with serde and serde_json
Define a Config struct with proper defaults
All tests must pass with cargo test
